name: Space Pong
description:
DEFEND YOUR PLANET

Move your paddle vertically to protect your planet from asteroids! When the HP of the enemy planet reaches 0, you will win!

LASER WEAPON

Whenever a match starts, the player with the least HP will receive a laser weapon that will fire at the asteroid as soon as the player has moved. Use the laser weapon to take advantage! 

SPACE THEME

Be careful when you move your paddle, because this is not the classic Pong, you are in space with a spatial gravity!

Play a few games and you will understand, have fun!

HOW TO DOWNLOAD

Windows:

  • Download ".zip" file
  • Extract ".zip" file wherever you want
  • Open SpacePong.exe to play the game

Mac:

If the game doesn't open after downloading the Mac version, try this:

  • Open your Terminal and go in the folder "SpacePongMac" with "cd" command, for example type "cd Downloads/SpacePongMac" and hit return
  • Now type "chmod 755 SpacePongMac.app/Contents/MacOS/SpacePong" and hit return
  • You should now be able to play the game by opening "SpacePongMac.app"
